data.title: old fashioned diner
data.text: Try the liver and onions, the gyro omelettes or the Greek salads. There's specials Monday through Friday, as well as the menu that includes Mexican, Greek and good American burgers, as well as a variety of salads.

data.title: Breakfast. Lunch and Dinner In a Strip Mall, Very Good Breakfast
data.text:
This place has been remodeled and is an open atmosphere and has really good breakfasts.  Also they have a good 'American' tacos with ground beef. They are open for Breakfast, Lunch and Dinner.  Only really busy at lunch as they are located next to the Westminster Court House and the jurors go there for lunch.
I would definitely recommend eating here.  It is a casual restaurant and family owned.
They also have daily specials.  Some of these items are not on the menu.

data.title: One of the best breakfast place we have visited during our stay
data.text: Small cafe next to the highway.  We have found them accidentally,  and seemed to be a great choiche.  Friendly staff, good location, great food!  Made our day!  Thank you!

data.title: Great Place for a Variety of Cuisines
data.text: We had dinner and both got Greek dishes. I had the beef kabobs and she had the half chicken. Both were perfect and came with a Greek salad. They had Italian dishes, steaks, burgers, Mexican dishes and a variety of ethnic cuisines.

data.title: Good diner!
data.text: After a big lunch this was the perfect answer for a light dinner. The menu is fairly large and eclectic. There is something for everyone. I opted for an egg salad sandwich on white bread with cole slaw. It was as good as any home made. Bright and intimate, it is the local answer to a diner. It was obvious that there is a large, local repeat clientele as many patrons were warmly greeted. Eating here is pretty much like eating home only easier. The service was good, and relaxed, adding to the comfortable, homey feel.

data.title: Great Place for Breakfast
data.text: We had a group of around 15 and the service was quick and the food is excellent. Lots of refills on Coffee and drinks. We have had this group there twice and everything was wonderful both times.

data.title: Breakfast Diner
data.text: I've passed this cafe many many times and today finally decided to stop in. I will visit it again. They serve breakfast, lunch, and dinner. My daughter had their breakfast burrito. She said it was ok, but she's still looking for a replacement for the one served at the former Hamburger Express. I had the waffle with fresh strawberries and whipped cream. This is not a Belgium waffle, but very good nonetheless. The restaurant itself is clean and welcoming. The servers were putting tables together for a larger party that looked like a business breakfast meeting. Service was fine. There is an area for outdoor seating with plastic tables and chairs. Not much of a view (Beach Blvd) but the area is surrounded by pigmy palm trees and other plants. A peaceful setting.

data.title: Tom Papas taste
data.text: Tom Papas, owner of the Cafe, hates dogs. He chases people out when they bring their dogs to the outside porch area, which is a public area.

data.title: Great ribeye breakfast
data.text: We found this place after picking up my brother from the Long Beach airport. Breakfast was very filling and tasty. Lots of locals here and service was friendly. If I didn't live so far away I'd definitely come back again.

data.title: Tasty!
data.text: I ordered a chorizo breakfast burrito and a waffle. When I realized there was a strand of hair in my burrito, the waitress immediately took it back and replaced the burrito free of charge. The owner/manager even walked over to my table to personally apologize. Friendly staff!

data.title: Excellent neighborhood cafe
data.text:
Uncle Pete's is has that neighborhood "Cheers" atmosphere and the food is excellent.  The menu and daily specials are extensive and there's something for everyone.  The portions are usually on the large size, so you won't leave hungry.

The owner (whose name is not Pete) is there most of the day and evening.  He almost always stops by your table and asks how the food is, and he really does want to know.  100% perfection is impossible so if something isn't right, he or the servers get it corrected fast.  They have a small kitchen, so during busy times you may need to be patient.  I eat at Uncle Pete's at least once or twice a week and highly recommend it!

data.title: Locals Delight
data.text: We probably eat here once or twice a week, it's that good.  The food is homemade, always hot, and always served with a smile. Best onion rings I've ever had.  If you like Greek food, they have some great choices. I especially love their authentic Greek salad (not the American version, but the real deal). Beer and wine, too.
